us.cost: $99/year for NFL Game Pass, various costs for cable/streaming packages
us.additionalInfo: Games are split between networks. Thursday Night Football exclusive to Amazon Prime. NFL Game Pass offers full game replays.

ca.additionalInfo: DAZN holds exclusive rights to all NFL games in Canada, including NFL Game Pass content.

gb.cost: £39.99/month for Sky Sports, £150.99/year for NFL Game Pass
gb.additionalInfo: Sky Sports shows select live games. NFL Game Pass offers all games live and on-demand.

de.cost: €14.99/month for DAZN, €163.99/year for NFL Game Pass
de.additionalInfo: DAZN shows select live games. NFL Game Pass offers all games live and on-demand.

au.cost: Varies for ESPN (via cable/satellite), AUD 274.99/year for NFL Game Pass
au.additionalInfo: ESPN shows select live games. NFL Game Pass offers all games live and on-demand.

mx.cost: MXN 1999/year for NFL Game Pass, varies for cable packages
mx.additionalInfo: Fox Sports and ESPN show select live games. NFL Game Pass offers all games live and on-demand.

br.cost: Varies for ESPN Brasil, R$ 499/year for NFL Game Pass
br.additionalInfo: ESPN Brasil shows select live games. NFL Game Pass offers all games live and on-demand.

jp.cost: ¥1,925/month for DAZN, ¥21,999/year for NFL Game Pass
jp.additionalInfo: DAZN shows select live games. NFL Game Pass offers all games live and on-demand.

fr.additionalInfo: beIN SPORTS holds primary rights, with L'Equipe showing some games

es.cost: Varies depending on package and provider
es.additionalInfo: Rights shared between Movistar+ and DAZN

it.additionalInfo: DAZN holds exclusive rights for NFL games in Italy

nl.additionalInfo: Viaplay acquired NFL rights for the Netherlands in recent years

za.additionalInfo: SuperSport holds rights for NFL coverage across much of Africa

in.additionalInfo: NFL Game Pass is the primary way to watch NFL games in India

cn.additionalInfo: Tencent has held digital rights for NFL in China in recent years

sg.additionalInfo: NFL Game Pass is the primary way to watch NFL games in Singapore

ph.additionalInfo: NFL Game Pass is the primary way to watch NFL games in the Philippines

ae.additionalInfo: NFL Game Pass is the primary way to watch NFL games in the UAE

ru.additionalInfo: NFL Game Pass is the primary way to watch NFL games in Russia

pl.additionalInfo: NFL Game Pass is the primary way to watch NFL games in Poland

tr.additionalInfo: NFL Game Pass is the primary way to watch NFL games in Turkey

th.additionalInfo: NFL Game Pass is the primary way to watch NFL games in Thailand

eg.additionalInfo: NFL Game Pass is the primary way to watch NFL games in Egypt

se.additionalInfo: Viaplay has held rights to NFL games in Sweden in recent years

no.additionalInfo: Viaplay has held rights to NFL games in Norway in recent years

dk.additionalInfo: Viaplay has held rights to NFL games in Denmark in recent years

gr.additionalInfo: NFL Game Pass is the primary way to watch NFL games in Greece
